allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix charm chart to query volland_exposure_points directly

The chart tab was intermittently showing stale charm data because it
queried the volland_vanna_points_dedup view, which was unreliable.
Now reads directly from volland_exposure_points \(WHERE greek=''charm''\),
the same table the worker writes to. Also adds a timestamp + staleness
indicator to the chart title.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
